subtitle: Curry spices add to this wonderfully exotic salad.

method.text: Place the cod in a steamer over a pan of simmering water; or on a plate over a pan of simmering water. Cover and steam for 4-5 min or until the fish flakes easily. Leave to cool.
In a large bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, lemon juice, seasoning, curry powder, coriander, salad onions, pasta, kiwi fruit, prawns and nuts.
Cut each pineapple in half through the centre. Carefully cut out the flesh leaving a 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>4</sub> cm border around the edge.
Roughly chop the pineapple and stir into the salad mixture. Add the cooked cod, taking care not to break it up on mixing.
Spoon the salad into the pineapple cases. Serve well chilled.

title: Fish, fruit and pasta salad, Coronation-style
